website_summaries.verdict: A good choice to improve the taste of your water without spending a lot. One of the most affordable and effective models available.
pros: Affordable, yet offers user-friendly features including a filter change indicator, reliable filtration, and a trim, space-saving design
Flip-top lid makes it bloody easy to fill
cons: Filter takes up a bit of space, reducing the jug's capacity
Water trickles slowly through the filter

customer_reviews.title: Has drastically improved the quality of my horrid drinking water
customer_reviews.text: Since moving to the greater London area from Scotland it's been an adjustment getting to grips with the hardness of the water here. Drinking the water made me gag and was cloudy and horrid. But I couldn't afford or haul big bottles of water constantly, so got this instead and what a lifesaver it is! The water is still not Scottish quality alas, but it is now clear and SO much more drinkable! I feel so much better about drinking tap water here now.
customer_reviews.author: ladyguinevere

customer_reviews.title: Even better value in the long term when you buy a ...
customer_reviews.text: Why pay more for a simple water and filter and jug? The quality of the AmazonBasics jug is very high, and the result just the same. Even better value in the long term when you buy a large pack of filters to refill it with.
customer_reviews.author: J Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Basic Filter Jug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to fill the reservoir of my espresso coffee machine as our tap water does not taste good. The jug comes with good instructions and is easy to use. The water takes a while to filter into the lower part of the jug - patience needed (and you cannot start pouring until the water in the top reservoir has all gone through to the lower section). There is a useful electronic gadget built into the lid which indicates when you need to change the filter cartridge. The filtered water tastes much better that the water from our tap and the coffee tastes noticeably better.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh de Lacy

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend
customer_reviews.text: Attractive looking good quality and a good capacity of water very reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Tracy grindey

customer_reviews.title: saved my throat
customer_reviews.text: recently moved to a hard water area and I wasn't happy with the way the tap water looked when I made my coffee (I have it black) and it seemed to give me a sore throat Someone recommended I try a water filter and I'm so glad I did. All is well with the water now. I even use filtered water to cook in. Would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: elegirl

customer_reviews.title: Spills down the front when pouring....
customer_reviews.text: My experience of this jug was intially positive, but after a few weeks the jug started spilling down the front when pouring which meant I had to use it over the sink every time I poured a glass of water. It's therefore not really fit for purpose. I would recommend a Brita Marella starter pack with three cartridges for around £20. This is much better quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyB

customer_reviews.title: Nice light jug as it holds less water which is fine to fill a small kettle
customer_reviews.text: Love this jug, I have had more expensive ones before but find I like this better than them, and for the price if it doesn't keep looking it's best I could buy 3 for the price of one of the others, which get shabby after a while anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a month now and cannot fault it. The water is very like spring water we had been buying from the supermarket and is much cheaper. We use it to fill 500ml bottles and do this without any spill due to its excellent pouring spout and also use the filtered water in the one cup hot water kettle so hot drinks taste much better than using tap water which has a lot of calcium in it. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: glassman

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by the specification!
customer_reviews.text: As water filters go, I daresay this one is competent, and it is certainly cheaper than the rest. What really annoys me is the misleading headline that it has a capacity of 2.3l. If you read through the details, it claims a filtered capacity of only 1.4l, and even that is optimistic. You can't fill the jug to the top because nearly 1l of the water doesn't pass through the filter but comes straight out of the spout when you pour it. I'd say this is a case for the local weights&measures officials!
customer_reviews.author: N. Woods

customer_reviews.title: So many stupid flaws
customer_reviews.text: The filter has 3 exit points at the bottom for the filtered water, only one of these holes lead to the bottom tank. The filter does not sit flush with the bottom of the top tank, so water sits trapped under the filter cartridge. The lid does not clip on securely, just sits on top, so be careful if you’re pouring while water is still in the top tank filtering through. I wish the design of this was better but it has so many stupid flaws it’s ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It is not used for drinking water. It is only used for filling the kettle, coffee maker and iron to reduce limescale, so unable to comment on taste of the water per se. The spout is a narrow compared with my previous Brita jug. Like the Brita jug it has a built in timer that needs resetting every 4 weeks. However it is measuring elapsed time and not measuring volume of water. In my opinion these timers are a waste of time - if timer is reset on day 1, and the jug is not used for 30 days, you are told to change the filter 30 days later which is silly. A good product nonetheless
customer_reviews.author: Home Cook

customer_reviews.title: It contains silver, not for a weak bladders.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed. I looked at a lot of filters and jugs. Picked this one for price. In the instruction manual it says the cartridge is treated with silver. Silver will get into the water. I’m horribly allergic to silver. No mention of it in the description on the website. As a water jug, it works fine. When water is filtering through it it does sound like someone peeing so be careful if you have a weak bladder. Lastly, there was an extremely strong plastic smell when I unpacked it. Didn’t seem very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Zero Girl

customer_reviews.title: Check the size!
customer_reviews.text: The description of this item is 2.3l. Either I was sent the wrong item or this description is at best misleading. The entire jug may well hold 2.3l but of that only about a litre has been filtered, the rest is sitting in the reservoir waiting. Now as it happens the jug is adequate most of the time, there are only two of us but when we get visitors it is a pain in the derrière, pouring our half a kettle and then waiting for the reservoir to filter through. I should probably have returned the item as soon as I realised it wasn’t 100% suitable but I can live with it most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Winward

customer_reviews.title: Quite simply, it works.
customer_reviews.text: Tap water in my area is perfectly wholesome but it tastes terrible! Tastes and smells strongly of chlorine. I bought this water filter to produce acceptable water for drinking and for making tea and coffee. I am delighted with the results. I love how the device on the lid reminds me when the filter needs to be changed. I thoroughly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Collins

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Basics!
customer_reviews.text: Can always depend on Amazon Basics, price and quality is spot on! water tastes great and last about 3 weeks for me as in a very hard water area. Alot cheaper that other brands and refill cartridges are very cheap in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: AmazonBasics Water Filter Jug 2.3L - Black
customer_reviews.text: This a great product does the job is cost effective and fits alongside the milk in my fridge door. Replacement filter cartridges are reasonably priced and it has a handy LED bar display that is easy to set when you install a new cartridge. This LED display makes it easy to determine when you need to replace the filter. The hard water purified tastes much nicer and will save me on the mineral water that I would normally buy. This will also reduce my carbon footprint on the environment regarding plastic bottle disposal. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product info and water doesn’t look safe to drink
customer_reviews.text: Actual capacity of filtered water is 1.25 ltr not 2.3. The remaining 1.05 ltr it’s probably the water that gets collected in the funnel where the filter is placed. But, if you fill the jug at full it’s not practical to pour the water out. Also, I spotted fine black dust collecting at the bottom of the jug, as the water seeped down through the filter. Gave it four times of pouring water in, filtering and pouring out on repeat to see if the dust would stop, like it was a result of priming the filter before use. But it didn’t stop so I’ve returned the item
customer_reviews.author: Simone Tomasi

customer_reviews.title: Water filter jug
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a filter jug before so have nothing to compare it with, but this seems to do a good job at a very reasonable price. I live in a hard water area and used to get a film on top of hot drinks, but this has eliminated that problem. I also expect it to reduce the limescale in the kettle and so help it last longer. No problems so far (after one month in use)and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs T

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this, it's so much easier to refill than the more expensive counterpart. Fits in the fridge door nicely and is, in my opinion, just as good if not better than Britax. I note that some people have an issue with the filter I soaked mine in a jug of water first for 10mins or so then followed the instructions and have no problem with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Great filter..
customer_reviews.text: The tap water in our house is like slime... If anyone remember the bath scene in ghost busters 2, it's pretty close to that!! This water jug does a fantastic job of cleaning up and treating the water. My tap water is now Crisp and clean. I was looking at the Brita range but decided to give this a try and so far no issues. Pouring and spillage isn't an issue like a few other reviews did mention so perhaps they have fixed that?
customer_reviews.author: MR C Reilly

customer_reviews.title: this is the second jug.  the first one was Brita.  Now having trouble again.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from Amazon; seems better than the Brita one I had where lid never stayed down. So now I followed all directions carefully and after some hours it was not working. Held the button down for a long time but it still is not working even though I have a new cartridge in it. TIME to quit messing around & just go back to tap water. Have wasted enough time. Thinking now I will return it if I can.
customer_reviews.author: trudy

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Limescale!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd water purifier. first one had a terrible after taste (years ago) and put me off. This one is good, simple and I have never seen my glass kettle so clear of limescale. It normally comes back within a few days of descaling. after several weeks of descaling (prior to purchase water purifier), I do use it a lot, it is still crystal clear. Love it. and really good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: AmazonBasics Water Filter Jug 2.3L: Fits nicely in fridge and is easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: This water filter jug lives totally up to my expectations. Most importantly it fits easily in my fridge door. It is simplicity to fill, just open the back of the black lid and fill. It also pours very well without spilling and the fresh clean taste of the water after filtration is most noticeable. Another great Amazon product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Roy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money !!
customer_reviews.text: We were very surprised by the tough plastic feel to this jug, just as good as the more expensive one's we've had in the past ! It's certainly not 'Basic' and will buy another when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: As good as a brita
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fits my brita filters which is ideal as I had plenty left over from my old filter. Doesn't spill when pouring if there's still water in the top section which is handy (unlike my old brita). If I'm gonna be really picky... the top of the handle sticks out too far so if you have little hands like me it's awkward to hold the handle and press the lever when filling but it's do-able
customer_reviews.author: lee beaton

customer_reviews.title: Better than Britax water jug
customer_reviews.text: The handle design on this jug is better than our Britax jug: yes it sticks out a bit, but because the handle is attached at the top AND the bottom to the body of the jug, it has more support especially when the just is full. We had to replace our Britax jug purely because the jug had started to crack where the handle was attached and it would only be a matter of time (of the jug being full) before the handle would’ve come away and broken off completely! I just wished this came in a larger capacity which would then make it equal to the Britax jug that it replaced. Very pleased with it, apart from that.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Never had filtered water before. Tried some at my step daughters in north London and was impressed. The water in Portland tastes OK except sometimes they overdose the treatment and the tea or coffee goes down the drain. Lovely tea and coffee now. Next job descale the kettle and see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. E. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: No need to spend a penny more.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jug with superb build quality compared to it's predecessor which cost the same. Clever engineering means it has no issues with spills when half-filtered and keeps the cleansed water separate from the tap. For the price I can't quibble, item bought and paid for myself at full price.
customer_reviews.author: watanabe43

customer_reviews.title: Good water filter jug! No leakage around the filter!
customer_reviews.text: Decent filter jug with maxtra compatible cartridges for use on it. The lid when full is secure but it has a slow pour and it can be a little awkward to clean as the lid is narrow and has a few crevices that need to be squirrelled into. Otherwise, it’s a great buy! Does nice filtered water!
customer_reviews.author: John Mulhall

customer_reviews.title: Annoying
customer_reviews.text: You diffently tell the difference in taste, my only annoyance is when you pour the water jug water pours down side of jug & soaks anything underneath highly annoying & you have to pour jug using two hands one holding T towel to stop water , i tend to use this to fill up a coffee machine
customer_reviews.author: A happy hippy

customer_reviews.title: Great value no nonsense filter jug
customer_reviews.text: Excellent great value am glad I started using it as living in hard water area limescale would plague my cups of tea. Now that's no longer a problem. Also nice to drink and cheaper and better on environmental scale than drinking from plastic water bottles. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Water tastes much better. Not too expensive re the filters, the ones I bought work out to about £4/week so not too bad. Lid seems a little flimsy, but for the price what does one expect. Providing I am careful it should be a good asset to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it said it was at a very good price
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace our water filter but we had already bought the filters in a multipack so was looking for the same product, this was at a much lower price than the Maxtra & the filters fit. Good looking filter, easy to refill and pours very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Having fallen foul from purchasing on Amazon a Jetery water jug (the filters are now unobtainable) so now left with a useless jug. I was suspicious of one made by Amazon. I needn't have been, it's an attractive shape, works well and there will be no problem buying filters.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money when I'm replacing it on a bi-monthly basis.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great water jug until it drops. Then it breaks on first drop. The first one I bought was dropped in the kitchen, so hard floor, I just thought I was unlucky so bought another. The second feel from the dining table into soft carpet! It's made from brittle plastic, simple as.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Keeton

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old one that cracked after three years. I like that it doesn’t take up much room in the refrigerator like most standard sized models. This unit is good for one or two people, but if you have a family I would recommend upsizing.
customer_reviews.author: CandyMan

customer_reviews.title: Now what's the not to like. Water tastes great and clean and it flies ...
customer_reviews.text: Now what's the not to like. Water tastes great and clean and it slides along on the work top so I never really have to lift it. But...Instructions say wash the top, if it's washed will it not compromise the integrity of the filter check? I'm not sure as yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bronzey

customer_reviews.title: Amazon water filter - great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I hate my water from the tap. I have had the 'branded' water filter before. This Amazon one far outweighs any other. Light to handle, quick to refill, very slim does not take up too much room. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Yarrow

customer_reviews.title: Just one week
customer_reviews.text: At first it worked well. Now not all the water filters through every time. There is more water above the filter than in the jug below. It takes far too long now to fill a kettle or the jug I have for fruit juice when it doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.author: Craig Houston

customer_reviews.title: Fits in fridge
customer_reviews.text: Receiced yesterday afternoon. Washed as per instructions before use, set the exchange indicator to 4 bars, filled and began to use. Water tastes so much better. The jug fits in our small fridge which is a bonus. However today the indicator is blank. I tried to reset, but nothing happened. I no longer have the packaging to return. Please can you send me a new exchange indicator. Also, is the lid supposed to rest or fit snug as we have to hold it on when we pour, so possibly a whole new jug would be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine. Just fill it carefully.
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong. I like this jug. It's just ultra annoying when the lid wont stay put while refilling. The slightest knock sends it flying. With Brita the lid stays firmly attached. This just seems to sit in the jug.
customer_reviews.author: YerDaSellsAvon

customer_reviews.title: Best buy compared to more expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a lot. Of time looking at water filters around cost and what is offered, I found this one and compared to some more expensive brands and found this was a better all round product. I have had it for 2 weeks now and so glad I choose this over other brands. Great all round for *Cost *Build quality *water capacity *fit. In the fridge
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell s.

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have around
customer_reviews.text: Great little piece of equipment for the kitchen. Tap water can sometimes be a bit iffy but much happier knowing it’s filtered and I feel a little better than buying the bottled kind with all the plastic. Easy to use, replacement filters aren’t as expensive as the Brita but I understand they are all interchangeable which is a plus. Good buy, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Woks well - good value
customer_reviews.text: This jug was inexpensive so I was concerned that it might not be of the best quality. However, it works well. We have hard water and the kettle was forever needing descaling. This problem has been eliminated.
customer_reviews.author: GaryB

customer_reviews.title: Good and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean, this jug does what it's supposed to do pretty efficiently. The little "timer" is quite basic but a nice touch to help you remember it might be time to change the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Débora

customer_reviews.title: Good basic product - would order again
customer_reviews.text: Good basic product - would order again. Definitely better design than Brita (which is just astounding as they should know better unless they want to jugs to break in time) and easy to clean and add water Would order again
customer_reviews.author: Alex G

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Filtered water tastes good. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Comes with instructions which are fine, maybe a little bit confusing. Easy to hold, pour and refill water. Most of it is dishwasher safe. Maybe I should have known but the filter that comes with it (1) will need replacing after a while (2 month maybe)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Holley

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because our tap water tastes awful & we were buying far too much water in plastic bottles. Since it arrived we haven’t bought any bottles, I’ve drunk more water, which now tastes pretty good & I use it to fill the coffee maker, kettle, dog’s bowl etc. It’s easy too use & so far, I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for around 2 weeks. It was easy to set up and a good size for the fridge door and for me and my little guy to use daily. It filters through pretty quickly and tastes nice. Cant fault it so far.
customer_reviews.author: TheBigYin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a Britta jug. It's well made and looks really nice. Takes the Britta cartridges as well. Very pleased with my purchase and would not hesitate to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RP London

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: The jug I received was marked up to 1.25l, even though the box and online description both stated 2.4l. I returned it and bought a Brita at a local store instead.
customer_reviews.author: M. Botha

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: So glad we got this water filter jug The difference is amazing you can actually see the difference and makes the water from out tap taste so much nicer have even notice my cup of tea tastes better
customer_reviews.author: Tony Eadie

customer_reviews.title: Fil(ter)s the bill nicely
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, intact and securely packaged. Having washed and conditioned the filter this jug works easily as well as the more expensive, branded item it has replaced. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful
customer_reviews.text: Delighted and can really taste the difference. Tap water in dublin can be hard and kind of chemical after taste... None of that anymore with the jug. Cheap and cheerful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more research
customer_reviews.text: I looked at so many water filters, but I realised that I cannot find a product with a better value. The quality of the filter matters and this can be used with a Brita as well. The jug feels quite sturdy and good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgieF

customer_reviews.title: Hard water essential - tea improved!!
customer_reviews.text: Simply put - there is no need for any other brand to filter your water. This jug has been in daily use and is as good as new. The design is excellent (the self closing spout is nice, isn’t exposed to any odours in the fridge!) Importantly it also takes Brita Maxtra and the cheaper alternatives as well, but I’ve found the Amazon one supplied works perfectly and shall order those in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs tweeking in order to have Amazon name
customer_reviews.text: So sorry for negative review but water goes everywhere when you pour(even gently)..Also I bought it as it says 'compatible with Brita filters' but they just wobbled out.
customer_reviews.author: Pat B.

customer_reviews.title: Great jug
customer_reviews.text: Great jug, comes with 1 filter that works well. Prices of the filters are a little high but if you get the AmazonBasics filters you will know they'll fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: At least as good as the Brita it replaces...
customer_reviews.text: ...and the filling flap makes it that much more easy to use. I just wish the capacity was slightly larger such that we didn't have to keep filling it so frequently. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Good and Useful
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought to replace a jug I had previously. I have used similar jugs for many years and are always pleased with the way they work to give me scum free black tea and coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Madmags

customer_reviews.title: Product as expected
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected and it is very easy to use. The tap water feels so much better. I used to think that water filter won't make any difference, but this product is very useful. My tap water doesn't taste as 'mineral thick' as before. Also, coffee, tea, ice cubes and my cooking taste so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Great,superslum fits anaverage fridge door perfectly. Quality materials used
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed. Had Brita before but why buy again when this is so good. Quality materials. Even spout has a metal anti-spillage cover. Great
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the box for half the price
customer_reviews.author: Dave W

customer_reviews.title: Clearly a great product
customer_reviews.text: We brought this water filter not just to drink clear and better tasting water but to use this water in our hardworking appliances. We were delighted with how clear and simple the instructions are and how easy the jug is to use. Very pleased and good value for money in our opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Christyfur

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value for Money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money My kettle was continually furring up and the water was so cloudy since using this the water is crystal clear
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: as good as any other filter jug
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Better shape and size than our previous jug. Works just as well as any other filter jug I’ve owned - and I’m saving money
customer_reviews.author: Wendy&BramleyPup

customer_reviews.title: Go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good, another item, that beats some of the more expensive water filters.
customer_reviews.author: john larvin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant. Easy to use. A very good price. Excellent value and customer service. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Romsonian

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for my broken one.
customer_reviews.text: I broke my old water filter so needed a new one. Reviews were good for this one and wanted one where you just pushed the filter down rather than a twist one. (If that makes sense) Filters can be bought for this too from Amazon. Easy to fill and water filters well. Happy customer and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lozie

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, comes with instructions but you don’t really need it. I haven’t changed the filter yet, the bar is set to 1 so I guess i’ll Change it soon. Cheap and does what it’s supposed to. No problems with it
customer_reviews.author: Dosa

customer_reviews.title: unbeatable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect jug at a fraction of the price of the leading brand, but does the exact same job. Fits easily in the fridge door, and makes my water taste so much better!
customer_reviews.author: blackrose20

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and means that there is always a supply of cold water from the fridge now. Since purchasing this item, I'll only drink the filtered water at home!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: The water from the filter does taste better. I was surprised when it arrived within a couple of days and didn’t contain unnecessary packaging and in working order.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Fits in fridge door
customer_reviews.text: This jug is really handy. It fits in the fridge door and saves money on bottled water. The water filters are cheaper than branded ones but still remove minerals and improve the taste of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic
customer_reviews.text: I hate tap water but this filter jug transforms the taste....brilliant! And I feel I'm doing a little bit towards saving the planet 😊
customer_reviews.author: ebony

customer_reviews.title: Better than alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always bought brita jugs in the past but decided to try an amazon one for ease. Very impressed. Does the job and comes with a free filter.
customer_reviews.author: ellen

customer_reviews.title: Sure it's good for humans too.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for watering my plants as too much limescale from tap water. Since using it, plants are definitely looking more healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly better than britta
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have any of the problems pouring other people have had. Slightly easier to use than our old Britta one.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy although it was cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Not well balanced and rather easy to tip when full, but worse still, the little counter ceased to work this week after barely six months use by one person.My last jug lasted for more than two years before I needed to change it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Fits in fridge door, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to stop my family resorting to bottled water because they say tap water tastes "funny". Had it a month in constant use and just ordered new filters. My son worked it out that not only did it save buying single use plastic bottles it was also cheaper per litre. (I had to take his word for it, he is the one doing A level maths). All in all very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: As good as the most expensive brand.Very easy to clean.Could be bit bigger but this is not an issue
customer_reviews.author: monica33

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this AmazonBasics filter jug. Water tastes just as good as the more expensive Brita jugs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Buyer.

customer_reviews.title: Great water filter jug
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace our Tesco one after they discontinued theirs. We like this one better, it’s a nicer design and the cartridges work out a bit cheaper
customer_reviews.author: NotMumboJumbo

customer_reviews.title: Very useful well designed
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and I live in a hard water area. Early days but I can taste the difference
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: It’s a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Cheap and very effective. Have a glass kettle since using this it’s remains totally scale free
customer_reviews.author: Saj Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain. It does what it says. Almost as refined as the Brita bottle. Excelent alternative
customer_reviews.author: Luis Lau

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: It was great until the first time I changed the filters, then the compartment that holds the unfiltered water cracked. They were the right size/model of filter cartridge and I didn't apply any excessive pressure to it. I suppose you get what you pay for but I was hoping to get a bit more than a month out of it, haha
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Great water filter
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know what the bad reviews are about I love this it’s easy and simple. And fits perfectly in my bush fridge door.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It works fine and does not take up too much room. Does need to be topped up quite often
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: As picture
customer_reviews.text: As descriped and fits in fridge door. Can be a little heavy but sturdy and obviously doesn't hold a great deal of water as slimline
customer_reviews.author: pollykins

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The "usage gauge" which shows the 4 week usage fails to work straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Really good jug. Works perfectly. Good tight fitting lid. No leaks or spills. Fits in fridge door. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality water
customer_reviews.text: No more plastic bottles from the supermarket, it is great and water feels refreshing, easy to change filters once a month
customer_reviews.author: Creed

customer_reviews.title: Tastier purer water
customer_reviews.text: Purer water and you can taste the difference. No more scaled kettles. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Patricia English

customer_reviews.title: Best jug I have ever brought
customer_reviews.text: Best jug I have ever brought. I have used a filter jug for years, I love the fact that you do not have to take the whole lid off to refill . Such great value for money and so inexpensive too.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Value for money against major brands. Occasionally filters difficult to purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: kim richmond

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant makes such a difference to the taste of the water
customer_reviews.author: Miss S. Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Better than more expensive alternatives
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with a years supply of filters and they work perfectly. Another basics hit
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rae

customer_reviews.title: Normal design.
customer_reviews.text: The product works normal. The flavour of the water is not always clean. Also, we have found some issues if you fill so much the water in the tank that the lid can
customer_reviews.author: Tranko

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality looks great does the job really good value would recommend very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Water Filter Jug 2.3L - White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteAmazonBasics offers everyday items for your home, office, garden and more. With a selection that continues to grow, the AmazonBasics brand is set to become a part of your daily convenience for electronics products and lifestyle.
feature_bullets: 2.3 L water filter jug with filtered-water capacity of 1.4 L; transparent design with white accents; designed to fit in fridge doors
Effectively reduces chlorine, limescale, and other water impurities; great for hard water
Electronic filter-replacement indicator signals when cartridge needs to be changed (every 30 days)
Flip-top lid for easy refilling at the sink; ergonomic handle for comfortable pouring; dishwasher-safe up to 50° C (with lid removed)
Compatible with AmazonBasics and BRITA MAXTRA water-filter cartridges; 1 AmazonBasics water-filter cartridge included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars837 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
